verses.name: Judges 6:4
verses.text: And they encamped against them, and destroyed the increase of the earth, till thou come unto Gaza, and left no sustenance for Israel, neither sheep, nor ox, nor ass.

verses.name: Judges 6:5
verses.text: For they came up with their cattle and their tents, and they came as grasshoppers for multitude; for both they and their camels were without number: and they entered into the land to destroy it.

verses.name: Judges 6:6
verses.text: And Israel was greatly impoverished because of the Midianites; and the children of Israel cried unto the Lord.

verses.name: Judges 6:7
verses.text: And it came to pass, when the children of Israel cried unto the Lord because of the Midianites,
